channel.title: Implementation of Programming Languages
channel.description: Recent content on Implementation of Programming Languages

item.title: Project Presentations
item.description: Projects will be presented on 9th of February, 2019 from 11:00 till 15:00 at hall 501.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Projects will be presented on 9th of February, 2019 at 11:00 at hall 501.

item.title: Midterm Test
item.description: The midterm test will be on 13th of December, 2019 in hall 325, from 19:00 till 20:30. It will cover everything up to representing values in the VM, including that. The test will account for 50% of your final marks. The project will bring in another 50% and all the homeworks are a bonus.

item.title: Homeworks
item.description: Virtual Machine and JSImpl related homeworks The tasks that can be used as homeworks are added as issues. Their status can be monitored on the projects page as well.

item.title: Resources
item.description: A general collection of resources on implementing programming languages and virtual machines.

item.title: About
item.description: About this website This is the website of a course on implementing programming languages.
